quote: The saddest thing in life is wasted talent.
author: A Bronx Tale

quote: Behind every sweet smile, there is a bitter sadness that no one can ever see and feel.
author: Tupac Shakur

quote: The way sadness works is one of the strange riddles of the world. If you are stricken with a great sadness, you may feel as if you have been set aflame, not only because of the enormous pain but also because your sadness may spread over your life, like smoke from an enormous fire.
author: Lemony Snicket

quote: The word 'happy' would lose its meaning if it were not balanced by sadness.
author: Carl Jung

quote: Experiencing sadness and anger can make you feel more creative, and by being creative, you can get beyond your pain or negativity.
author: Yoko Ono

quote: Tears come from the heart and not from the brain.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: The greatest happiness you can have is knowing that you do not necessarily require happiness.
author: William Saroyan

quote: There is no sadder sight than a young pessimist.
author: Mark Twain

quote: The longer and more carefully we look at a funny story, the sadder it becomes.
author: Nikolai Gogol

quote: When I am dead, I hope it may be said: 'His sins were scarlet, but his books were read.'
author: Hilaire Belloc

quote: Sadness is but a wall between two gardens.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: The walls we build around us to keep sadness out also keep out the joy.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: You cannot protect yourself from sadness without protecting yourself from happiness.
author: Jonathan Safran Foer

quote: The greatest griefs are those we cause ourselves.
author: Sophocles

quote: Sometimes I'm not angry, I'm hurt, and there's a big difference.
author: Unknown

quote: Don't be sad because it's over, smile because it happened.
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: The soul would have no rainbow if the eyes had no tears.
author: John Vance Cheney

quote: Sadness is a superpower if you survive it.
author: Rupi Kaur

quote: You can close your eyes to things you don't want to see, but you can't close your heart to things you don't want to feel.
author: Johnny Depp

quote: Every man has his secret sorrows which the world knows not, and often times we call a man cold when he is only sad.
author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quote: Tears are words that need to be written.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: When sorrows come, they come not single spies, but in battalions.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Sadness flies away on the wings of time.
author: Jean de La Fontaine

quote: The tragedy of life is not that it ends so soon, but that we wait so long to begin it.
author: W. M. Lewis

quote: The worst kind of sad is not being able to explain why.
author: Unknown

quote: Sadness is the result of unhappy thoughts.
author: Unknown

quote: If you're enjoying the journey, you're in the right place. If you're suffering, you're not in alignment with yourself. Your purpose is not to suffer. Your purpose is to create.
author: Abraham Hicks

quote: The longer I live, the more I realize the impact of attitude on life. Attitude, to me, is more important than facts. It is more important than the past, than education, than money, than circumstances, than failures, than successes, than what other people think or say or do. It is more important than appearance, giftedness, or skill. It will make or break a company... a church... a home. The remarkable thing is we have a choice every day regarding the attitude we will embrace for that day. We cannot change our past... we cannot change the fact that people will act in a certain way. We cannot change the inevitable. The only thing we can do is play on the one string we have, and that is our attitude... I am convinced that life is 10% what happens to me and 90% how I react to it. And so it is with you... we are in charge of our attitudes.
author: Charles R. Swindoll
